name: Straitjacket (MadHatters)
description:
GAME IS IN BETA ACCESS

Come and see our boot at White Nights in Berlin in February 2019!

You get to play as Bill, a psycho, a mental patient who tries to get to the top floor of an assylum, he fights through nurses and doctors to save another patient he fell in love with. Bill is a bit of a junkie and he can take advantage of the pills he finds to change his surroundings from the Real world to a Magic world.

In the handpainted environment of the Real world, you are locked up in a straitjacket, you slowly move through a 2,5D environment, hiding from enemies and interacting with objects to get to the end of the level.

In the Magic world, everything changes into a heroic dungeon. You move faster, you can break obstacles and defeat various enemies through a button-pressing combat system.
